students.name: Lachlan Begbie
students.bio: I'm Lachlan Begbie, and I've just completed my Bachelor of Design (Interaction Design). I have engaged with projects to develop usable digital systems, and considered the application of user psychology to the design of the web.
students.projectbio: The project I have on display is a web-based portfolio for a photographer. It considers the way items are collected online, and how the work of the artist is best put on display.
